text: Vamachara or Vama marga (Left-Hand Path) are technical terms used for practices in tantra that are considered to be outside the usual Hindu social norms. The term Dakshinachara (Right-Hand Path) is used to refer to Tantric sects that stay within these social norms. Category:Hinduism Due to influence of kaliyug and negative beings this practice is highly adulterated, and vamachar done by causing harm to any living being will results in more degradation of practitioner mentally, physically, socially and economically.
title: Vamachara
